#summary This function dumps the contents of your cache.

Pass in the `category` argument to only dump the items of a specific type (action, partial etc). This function uses cfdump internally to dump the cache.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| category || no || string || || "action", "partial" or "query" ||

*Examples:*

{{{
#dumpCache()#
}}}

{{{
#dumpCache("query")#
}}}

See the section on [Caching] for more information and code examples.
